prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent:
Store opening hours:
Monday - Friday: 9:00 - 17:00
Saturday: 8:00 - 12:00
Sunday: Closed

prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, detect the important keywords in the document.

# Rules

-   Write just keywords separated by comma

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgePieceContent}

promptResult.content: Store hours, opening hours, business hours, weekday hours, weekend hours, Monday, Friday, Saturday, Sunday, closed
